welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sofiyivs'ka Borshchahivka, a charming city known for its rich history, stunning landscapes, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay and make unforgettable memories here.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zhulyany Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zhulyany Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gostomel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at Boryspil Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: A temporary terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
